text: @Nick_Unsworth @RosieP4 @CllrRob @JamesAbbott2013 @pritipatel The @envagency name is an oxymoron: it should be called The (Destroy The) Environment Agency after it permitted a giant waste incinerator to operate 2-miles from Coggeshall and is now pushing for the vast Coggeshall quarry just 150 metres from homes. The EA is not fit for purpose

text: @MBAAssociates @thisfarmlife @agricontract @EnvAgency @BarristersHorse You need to get a better idea about how rivers/catchments work before commenting. Ollie's explanation and solution are simplistic & worthless. Rivers are not drains. Rivers have always flooded. Draining water quickly off land into Straightened rivers causes more/worse flooding.

text:
@TM_WRT @agricontract @JamesAgscope @EnvAgency Our water cycle is pretty screwed up, soil compaction, emptying aquifers, soil erosion, bare earth arable, short grass systems, hard urban and architectural surfaces etc etc.
Ice cap melt is now adding to the above and will continue to do so, we need to sequester CO2 + H2O

RT @SayNo2SizewellC: Global ice loss accelerating at record rate, study finds
“Sea level rise on this scale will have very serious impacts…

@agricontract @EnvAgency It might be a good idea to have a chat to a hydrologist before dredging. Surface drains control surface water. Moving groundwater requires a hydraulic gradient. It’s unlikely the silt is preventing groundwater from leaving the soil profile.

@EnvAgency  Someone has left it in the PDF Title metadata which get's picked up in the Google crawl

https://t.co/0hbJG8JQ5D

text: RT @agricontract: Im sick of flooding can the @EnvAgency please look at what the Dutch to control rain fall remember you used to be called…

@MattEAShardlow @TimGue1 @powell_peter @agricontract @EnvAgency You don't buy a vehicle & expect it to run forever, you have to maintain it, it's exactly the same with waterways & drainage systems, unfortunately the lack of maintenance is now coming to a point of no return & it's going to be a massive expensive feat.

@agricontract @EnvAgency NRA Used to clear river of anything over hanging and burn it in piles about every 3 yrs.Stopped when became EA.Blockages actually wash the banks out and drop the silt further down. Large green energy farmer filled river with sand run off too.Needs cooperation and less red tape.
